GSD.description:
ntfs: fix out-of-bounds read in ntfs_attr_find()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.156 by commit 6322dda483344abe47d17335809f7bbb730bd88b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ntfs: fix out-of-bounds read in ntfs_attr_find()
